column4: Hey ubuntu Chat! I'm on a sony vaio laptop, and everything works out fine, except for when I try and hook up an external VGA moniter.  Nothing happens at all.  Do yall have any idea why this might be?
Don't you have a key combo on your keyboard that normally selects internal/external/both as output? On my IBM for instance it's FN key (bottom left) and F7
I do and typically they work, but the one to switch moniters doesn't work for some reason
